answers.answer: I had mine today.. It wasn't as bad as the one I did with my first little girl but yup was still yuck haha. But it's pretty quick and easy :) just drink the drink, wait an hour and then have a blood test. But some places just do the 2hr one where you have to fast and have a blood test each hour, thats one I wouldn't like! I don't like blood tests haha
I don't like getting my blood work done. but as long as I have nothing wrong with me or my son I will be happy.
I've taken the 2 hour twice with this pregnancy but it was because I had gestational diabetes with both of my daughters. The drink doesn't taste the greatest but if you get it cold its bearable.
I did mine today its really not that bad. It taste like bitter cool aide. Just drink it down really fast and hopefully they give you it cold.
well thanks ladies. I knew there would be other woman that took the test today. I hope it is cold now.. I am 27 weeks how far r u ladies?
Im 26 weeks and the second time im taking the test because diabetes runs in my family. But so far so good.
I'm 31wk , I took the first glucose test at 3 mos. and the 2nd just a couple of weeks ago.Wishing you and baby the best!

question: I have a doc appt. this afternoon. and I have my sugar test not looking forward to this at all. I heared it is not good at all. any of u just had the test or about to get it? things prego women have to go throw..
title: 27 weeks and. couple days.
